original: @175b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @175b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya hi ra n+ya ba ti n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
analyzed: a'arya hi ra n+ya ba ti n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
translated: Ārya-hiraṇyavati-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs //
analyzed: 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs //
translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī Called “Endowed with Gold”

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas. Thus have I heard at one time.🔽The Blessed One was dwelling on the white rock of Tuṣita, together with many thousands of bodhisattvas, all of whom were prophesied to attain

original: bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na lva ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na lva ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa /
translated: unsurpassed perfect enlightenment,

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
translated: and were only one birth away.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis @176a *//
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis @176a *//
translated: Then the Blessed One

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa /🔽legs par gnas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa /🔽legs par gnas /
translated: said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sumāgadhā:🔽“Sumāgadhā,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo //🔽ma thos so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo // ma thos so //
translated: “Bodhisattva mahāsattvas who do not wish to possess this dhāraṇī of the treasure will not see the tathāgatas of the past, the future, and the present.

original: ma myong ngo //
analyzed: ma myong ngo //
translated: They will not hear them.🔽They will not experience them.

original: gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des gzungs thob bo //
analyzed: gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des gzungs thob bo //
translated: Those who see, hear, and experience the tathāgatas in this way will obtain the dhāraṇī.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar legs par gnas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar legs par gnas /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /🔽bdag gis bsod nams byas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / bdag gis bsod nams byas so //
translated: It is because bodhisattva mahāsattvas

original: zhes mi 'dzin /🔽bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas so //
analyzed: zhes mi 'dzin / bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas so //
translated: do not think, ‘I have created merit.’

original: zhes mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: zhes mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not think, ‘I have created demerit, virtue, or nonvirtue.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar legs par gnas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar legs par gnas /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /🔽gzugs 'dzin par mi rtog /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / gzugs 'dzin par mi rtog /
translated: It is because bodhisattva mahāsattvas

original: rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: do not conceive of or think about form.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni /🔽'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram /🔽mtshan nyid du mi rtog /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram / mtshan nyid du mi rtog /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who has attained retention

original: yongs su mi rtog ste /
analyzed: yongs su mi rtog ste /
translated: does not conceptualize or fully conceptualize past, future, or present phenomena as entities🔽or as characteristics.

original: rkyen du ma yin /
analyzed: rkyen du ma yin /
translated: He does not conceptualize them as conditions

original: rkyen med par ma yin /🔽'gro bar ma yin /
analyzed: rkyen med par ma yin / 'gro bar ma yin /
translated: or as not conditions,🔽as going

original: 'gro ba med par ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba med par ma yin /
translated: or as not going,

original: 'chi 'phor ma yin /
analyzed: 'chi 'phor ma yin /
translated: as death

original: skye bar ma yin /
analyzed: skye bar ma yin /
translated: or as birth,🔽as empty

original: stong par ma yin /🔽mi stod @176b par ma yin /🔽mtshan mar ma yin /
analyzed: stong par ma yin / mi stod @176b par ma yin / mtshan mar ma yin /
translated: or as not empty,🔽as signs

original: mtshan ma med par ma yin /🔽smon par ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med par ma yin / smon par ma yin /
translated: or as signless,🔽as wishes

original: smon pa med bar ma yin /
analyzed: smon pa med bar ma yin /
translated: or as wishless,

original: skye bar ma yin /
analyzed: skye bar ma yin /
translated: as arising

original: 'gag par ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gag par ma yin no //
translated: or as ceasing.

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: He abides well.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni /🔽ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni / ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices with this limit🔽is said to abide in wisdom.

original: gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: When he abides in wisdom, he is said to be in nirvāṇa.

original: gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te /
translated: When they attain nirvāṇa, they will then take up, master, and uphold the dhāraṇī of the treasure.

original: don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning and the words will not be exhausted.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te /
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te /
translated: They will be those who have the morality of not being examined,

original: bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no //
analyzed: bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no //
translated: the morality of truth, and the morality of purity.

original: ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te /
analyzed: ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te /
translated: They will be those who have the Dharma of not being examined,

original: bden pa'i chos dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: bden pa'i chos dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no //
translated: the Dharma of truth, and the Dharma of purity.

original: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so //
translated: They will not be dependent on others and will be engaged in their own Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o //
translated: They will have served the buddhas well.

original: rigs pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o //
translated: They will be engaged in the ritual of reasoning.

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: They will be well established.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so //
translated: In that way, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas will not be attached,

original: mi 'chang ngo //
analyzed: mi 'chang ngo //
translated: will not hold on,

original: mi 'grol lo //
analyzed: mi 'grol lo //
translated: and will not be liberated.

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: They will be well established.

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags /
translated: When the bodhisattva mahāsattva does not cling,

original: mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @177a *//
analyzed: mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @177a *//
translated: does not hold, and does not release, at that time the buddhas of the past, future, and present—

original: 'das rnams kyis rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'das rnams kyis rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob bo //
translated: the blessed buddhas of the buddha family—will bestow the dhāraṇī of the vajra through the other names of the vidyā mantras.🔽Tadyathā:

original: tadya th'a / ku ti ku ti /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ku ti ku ti /
translated: kuṭi kuṭi

original: ku tsa la /
analyzed: ku tsa la /
translated: kuca la

original: ae l'a ai mi ri to //
analyzed: ae l'a ai mi ri to //
translated: elā imiriṭa

original: ko th'a la /🔽ae re ri /
analyzed: ko th'a la / ae re ri /
translated: koṭhala🔽ereri

original: ae mi ri ni /
analyzed: ae mi ri ni /
translated: emiriṇi

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: Well-established,

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: these are

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no //
translated: the other names of the vidyā mantras of the blessed buddhas of the past.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no //
translated: They are the other names of the vidyā mantras of the blessed buddhas of the past, future, and present.

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: Well-established,

original: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni /
analyzed: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni /
translated: this dhāraṇī of the vajra

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo //
translated: It is the mother of the past, future, and present Bhagavat Buddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'das pa'i don la mi gnas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'das pa'i don la mi gnas /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because it does not dwell in the past,

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it does not dwell in the future, and it does not dwell in the present.

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: “Excellent, excellent, Subhūti!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no //
translated: Any bodhisattva mahāsattva who possesses this dhāraṇī of the jewel will have made offerings and served countless Bhagavat Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no //
translated: They will have been prophesied by countless Bhagavat Buddhas to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: legs par gnas /
analyzed: legs par gnas /
translated: “Excellent, excellent, Subhūti!

original: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'jin pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @177b 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'jin pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @177b 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who possesses this Dhāraṇī of Wealth should think, ‘I have served and made offerings to countless Bhagavān Buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par byas /🔽bsnyen bkur byas /🔽mchod par byas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par byas / bsnyen bkur byas / mchod par byas so //
translated: attained the wisdom of the Buddha,

original: bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o //
translated: and generated immeasurable merit.’

original: su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: Whoever possesses this Dhāraṇī of Wealth will have their wishes fulfilled.

original: shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //🔽'di'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro // 'di'i cho ga ni /
translated: If they desire wisdom, they will attain wisdom; if they desire dhāraṇī, they will attain dhāraṇī; if they desire wealth, they will attain wealth; if they desire learning, they will attain learning.

original: 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di yin te /
translated: The ritual is as follows:

original: zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza' 'o //
analyzed: zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza' 'o //
translated: On the waxing moon, at sunrise, one should eat rice gruel mixed with milk.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o //
translated: One should constantly keep in mind these awareness mantras of the buddhas and the names of the other blessed buddhas.

original: 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam /
translated: Moreover, by the power of these mantra bases, those who dwell in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River—whether they are asuras,

original: nam mkha' lding ngam /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding ngam /
translated: garuḍas,

original: mi 'am ci 'am /
analyzed: mi 'am ci 'am /
translated: kinnaras,🔽mahoragas,

original: lto 'phye chen po'am /
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po'am /
translated: yakṣas,

original: gnod sbyin nam /🔽yi dvags sam /
analyzed: gnod sbyin nam / yi dvags sam /
translated: pretas,

original: grul bum mam /
analyzed: grul bum mam /
translated: kumbhāṇḍas,

original: sha za'am / mi 'am /
analyzed: sha za'am / mi 'am /
translated: piśācas, humans,

original: mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or non-humans—will feel joy toward them.

original: bar chad byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: bar chad byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not create obstacles for them.

original: rtag tu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rtag tu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur /
translated: They will always be protected.

original: byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur /
translated: They will be protected by awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' @178a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' @178a *//
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha

original: bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the bodhisattvas of the Akaniṣṭha realm will also protect him.

original: 'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattvas of the Akaniṣṭha realm will also bless him,🔽so that he will not be afraid,

original: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa'am /🔽dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur /
analyzed: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa'am / dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur /
translated: will not be terrified,

original: de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur /
translated: and will not be frightened.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na lva ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na lva ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: The Blessed One, seated on a white boulder in Tuṣita, spoke thus. The bodhisattva mahāsattva Sumati and the many thousands of bodhisattvas rejoiced and praised what the Blessed One had said.

original: 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i zungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i zungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Dhāraṇī of the Jewel is completed.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptors Jinamitra and Dānaśīla, and the chief editor and translator Bandé Yeshé Dé, who revised it in the new language, making corrections.
